title: To Satya, a toast to your Birthday!
author: dezcom

comments.content: Happy birthday, Satya! Make sure to take a break from work to celebrate.

Thank you, everyone!  
It was hot and a happy day.

Not too late I hope.  
Happy Birthday, Satya!

I'm wishing you a happy-happy birthday sir, the happiest you've ever had ;^) Whatever you end up doing to celebrate, do take care, because we are thinking of you. Make the most of your creative giftedness. We are interested. We are very interested.

And rock on dude. Keep a' rockin!

j a m e s
